__e: We got your Christmas card the other day, and my family and I are very flattered that you remembered us.
1. We will are very glad to receive your any idea about our production.
We were very happy to know that even after 5 years the light is running perfectly with no power lost ;-)
We did very well without you for five years.
We never stay settled very long in a home, do we?
And that's what we always get if we stay too long near any one town.
Any one of us could have gotten to him.
Yes, I just don't know how we ever got along without her.
- You were right, it's a paradise.
why don't we stay here for a little longer?
Do you mind if we stay here a while, or must you go home?
It was awful, we almost had to stay at home.
Well, I hardly feel this town so small anymore
The first day we stayed in.
We just stick around in one place... until it gets too hot, then we move along. Get it?

After all, we were together for so long.
Listen. What a surprise. Listen, I...
Charles. He came after his last class and we were together for more than an hour.
What do you mean, "we all got together"?
Either we are together in the open, or we don't see each other anymore!
It's so nice in here - nice lunch, sunshine...
Frank, you know we've had this car over six hours.
And after all that, what have you got?
All right, we'll take the house.
Anyway, he gave us the Family for a while.
And after all that, what have you got?

He keeps the money, but we get the women.
